definition: tree trunk/main part of sth/to manage/to work/to do/capable/cadre/to kill (slang)/to fuck (vulgar)

sentences.english: In 2007, she became the Vice President of the ministry.
sentences.chinese: 在2007年成为布道团的副总干事。

sentences.english: WHO Director-General Dr Margaret Chan will open the meeting.
sentences.chinese: 世卫组织总干事陈冯富珍博士将宣布会议开幕。

sentences.english: The Assembly will consider the Board's nomination, and appoint a Director-General.
sentences.chinese: 大会将审议执委会的提名和任命总干事。

sentences.english: Fu Cong, a Chinese national, is adviser to the Director-General.
sentences.chinese: 傅聪，中国籍，任总干事顾问。

sentences.english: David Gordon is Executive Director at Pacific Environment.
sentences.chinese: 大卫戈顿是太平洋环境组织的总干事。

sentences.english: The Director General shall register this Act with the Secretariat of the United Nations.
sentences.chinese: 总干事应将本议定书交联合国秘书处登记。

sentences.english: Yukiya Amano, the International Atomic Energy Agency's director general, said the situation was "very serious".
sentences.chinese: 国际原子能机构总干事天野之弥说情况“非常紧急”。

sentences.english: Mr Fu Cong, from China, is appointed as Adviser to the Director-General.
sentences.chinese: 来自中国的傅聪先生将任总干事顾问。

sentences.english: A deputy director for the foundation attended Mr. Cai's press conference.
sentences.chinese: 基金一位副总干事参加了蔡铭超的新闻发布会。

sentences.english: The responsibilities of the Director-General and of the staff of the Secretariat shall be exclusively international in character.
sentences.chinese: 总干事和秘书处职员的职责纯属国际性质。

sentences.english: The Conference also elects a Director-General to a six-year term.
sentences.chinese: 大会还选出一名总干事，任期6年。

sentences.english: Bruce resigned in January 2011- may God prepare the next General Secretary.
sentences.chinese: 月底离职，求主预备新总干事。

sentences.english: Any Contracting Party may denounce this Treaty by notification addressed to the Director General.
sentences.chinese: 任何缔约方均可退出本条约，退约应通知总干事。

sentences.english: I thank you once again, Mr. Director-General, for that prestigious nomination.
sentences.chinese: 再一次谢谢德高望重的总干事先生的任命。

sentences.english: What is the process for electing a new Director-General?
sentences.chinese: 什么是选举新总干事的程序？

sentences.english: I will also hold weekly meetings with Assistant Directors-General.
sentences.chinese: 我还将每周与各助理总干事召开会议。

pinyin: Lian2 he2 guo2 Kai1 fa1 Ji4 hua4 shu3
